full_summary:
========
Below is an announcement for a Government of Canada tender for Maintenance and Repair Services for Petroleum and Allied Petroleum Supply Infrastructure.

### Notice Details

**Title**: W6897-240076 - Provision of Maintenance and Repair Services for Petroleum and Allied Petroleum Supply Infrastructure

**Reference Number**: WS4511819892-Doc4511841396

**Solicitation Number**: WS4511819892

**Publication Date**: April 26, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: May 21, 2024, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (ET)

### Notice Information

The Government of Canada invites qualified contractors to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for maintenance and repair services for petroleum and allied petroleum supply infrastructure. This Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) will provide skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials as requested by the Department of National Defence (DND) in the form of a Call-up (Purchase Order) for mechanical services.

    * **Location**: CFB Suffield, Alberta
    * **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    * **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Notice Related Documents**

The tender notice and related documents can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform at: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19529827?extsite=MTk1Mjk4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Tender Documentation Requirements

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 21, 2024, at 14:00 ET. Bid submissions after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Matthew Keenan, Business Development Officer, at [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][1]

Thank you for your attention to this tender announcement. We look forward to reviewing your bid!
